Name: cocoon production, silkworm rearing | cocoons | EN15804GD, U
Category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/01:Crop and animal production, hunting and related service activities/014:Animal production/0149:Raising of other animals
Description: Average based on data collected from farmer at Guna district in the state of Madhya Pradesh (Central India). Data was also collected from Manager of District Coocoon bank, which is Government operated cocoon distribution centre.Sericulture is a well organised and to a large extent government monitored activity to promote it as a local revenue source for goverment and employment for the poor.
